name: Vitamin C
description:
INGREDIENTS:

  • Wild rose extract (Rosa canina)
  • Acerola extract (Malpighia glabra L.)
  • Goji berries extract (Lycium Barbarom)
  • Bitter melon extract (Momordica charantia)

DAILY RECOMMENDED USE:

1 capsule per day. Do not exceed recommended dosage during the day. Dietary supplements can not be used as a substitute for a varied diet. Balanced diet and a healthy lifestyle are important to maintain good health. It shouldn’t be used by people prone to kidney stones and with hypersensitivity to any of the ingredients. You will achieve results by using only 1 capsules per day.

name: Vitamin K2+D3 Plus
shortDescription: Souvre Vitamin K2 + D3 Plus is recommended for adults as a suplement of omega 3, vitamins A, D3 and K2, for people staying in the sun less than 15 minutes a day and / or applying creams with UV protection. As well as for people who are physically active, the elderly and people who care for maintaining healthy bones, teeth, eyes, and normal function of the cardiovascular system.
description:
INGREDIENTS:

  • Cod liver oil (fish oil)
  • Vitamin A
  • Vitamin K2 (menaquinone)
  • Vitamin D3

DAILY RECOMMENDED USE:

1 capsule per day. Do not exceed recommended dosage during the day. Balanced diet and a healthy lifestyle are important to maintain good health. You will achieve results by using only 1 capsule per day.

name: Joints
shortDescription: Souvre Joints is a dietary supplement containing a combination of four components affecting the functioning of the locomotor system: an innovative complex of freeze-dried native fish collagen from shark cartilage, glucosamine, hyaluronic acid and extract of Indian incense.
description:
INGREDIENTS:

  • Lyophilized fish collagen from shark cartilage
  • Glucosamine Sulfate 2 KCl
  • Extract of Indian incense (Boswellia Serrata)
  • Hyaluronic acid

DAILY RECOMMENDED USE:

2 capsules per day during a meal. Do not exceed recommended dosage during the day. Dietary supplements can not be used as a substitute for a varied diet. Balanced diet and a healthy lifestyle are important to maintain good health. Do not use if you suffer from hypersensitivity to any of the ingredients. You will achieve results by using only 2 capsules per day.

name: Vitamin B Plus
shortDescription: Dietary supplement Souvre Vitamin B Plus contains a complete complex of 11 different vitamins from group B enriched with alpha lipoic acid — a substance similar to a vitamin in its nature, which is a strong antioxidant that is soluble both in water and fats. The complex of vitamins comprises: vitamin B1 (thiamine), vitamin B2 (riboflavin), vitamin B3 (niacin), vitamin B4 (choline), vitamin B5 (pantothenic acid), vitamin B6 (pyridoxines), vitamin B7 (biotin), vitamin B8 (inositol), vitamin B9 (folic acid), vitamin B10 (para-aminobenzoic acid) and vitamin B12 (cyanocobalamin). Vitamins from group B are significant for processes that take place in the whole body, and the specially selected composition and dosing facilitate meeting the demand for these substances. The vitamin complex helps in proper functioning of immunity and nervous systems and in maintaining proper metabolism of homocysteine – amino acids that constitute the basic building units of human protein.
description:
Ingredients - 2 capsules

  • Vitamin B1 - 2,2 mg (200%*);
  • Vitamin B2 - 2,8 mg (200%*);
  • Niacin - 32 mg (200%*);
  • Vitamin B6 4,2 mg (300%*);
  • Folic acid - 400 µg (200%*);
  • Vitamin B12 - 5 µg (200%*);
  • Biotin - 150 µg (300%*);
  • Pantothenic acid - 12 mg (200%*);
  • Inositol - 250 mg;
  • Para-aminobenzoic acid [PABA] - 50 mg;
  • Alpha lipoic acid  - 100 mg;
  • Choline - 175 mg.

*NRV - Nutrient Reference Value
